alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:59PM MDT until June 20 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Northwestern Bon Homme County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Douglas County in south central South Dakota... Southwestern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dante, or 16 miles west of Tyndall, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tripp, Delmont and Kaylor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Hutchinson
